    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Devil's Trident](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1477)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monsters of Myth](/Sources.aspx?ID=107) pg. 47

**Price** 100 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Trident](/Weapons.aspx?ID=45)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [returning](/Equipment.aspx?ID=301) [trident](/Weapons.aspx?ID=45)_ is made of an ancient black metal that glistens unnaturally and is cold to the touch. The prongs of this trident drip with metallic lake water. Strikes with the _Devil's Trident_ trigger the weaknesses of any creature with a weakness to water.

**Activate** <actions string="Reaction" /> Command;   **Trigger** You critically hit a creature;  **Effect** The target must succeed at a DC 25 Fortitude save or become infected with [sewer haze](/Diseases.aspx?ID=11).

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> envision, Interact;  **Frequency** once per hour;   **Effect** The trident casts 3rd-level [_quench_](/Spells.aspx?ID=709) with a DC of 25 and a [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) modifier of +15. You can Sustain the Spell as normal.

**Activate** <actions string="Three Actions" /> envision, Interact;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You call upon the corrupted power of the trident to stay a foe. Attempt a Strike. On a hit, the trident casts 3rd-level [_paralyze_](/Spells.aspx?ID=213) on the target (DC 25). If the Strike was a critical hit, the target is [stunned 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36) even if it critically succeeds at the save.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
